title: Vendor 1
content: This vendor produces ratan bags as a living coming from his passion for his heritage

title: Vendor 2
content: This crunchy and sweet sarang semut made out of flour and sugar along with their secret ingredient makes up a very sweet savoury delicacy

title: Vendor 3
content: Hand weaved ratan rugs that would look aesthetically pleasing in a modern house. This is a work of percision and art
